name: part_001
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY1】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE1【チラ見せ】 [IKkSNj5uN6I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Promotional advertisements for hololive goods, exhibition booths, collaborations (UNDONE, iPASS), and JOYSOUND X1.
Gallery showcase of fan message boards from hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony.
Safety instructions and venue guidelines for event visitors.
Continuation of the fan message board gallery.

subtitles.original: ホロライブ #hololive IF -Relax time- 天音かなた
subtitles.english: hololive #hololive IF -Relax time- Amane Kanata

subtitles.original: ホロライブ #hololive petit ラウンドクッション 天音かなた
subtitles.english: hololive #hololive petit Round Cushion Amane Kanata

subtitles.original: ホロライブエキスポ2025限定の、一番くじ特設フォトブースも展開中。
subtitles.english: An Ichiban Kuji special photo booth limited to hololive EXPO 2025 is also now open.

subtitles.original: モニターをタッチしてくじ券をめくり、出てきたデザインと一緒に撮影できます。
subtitles.english: You can touch the monitor to reveal a lottery ticket and take a photo with the design that appears.

subtitles.original: The last frontier...
subtitles.english: The last frontier...

subtitles.original: hololive 5th fes.で歌われた名曲『The Last Frontier』からなんと！フィギュア化決定！
subtitles.english: The masterpiece 'The Last Frontier' performed at hololive 5th fes. is finally getting a figure release!

subtitles.original: スケールフィギュア化決定！星街すいせい / AZKi
subtitles.english: Scale figures announced! Hoshimachi Suisei / AZKi

subtitles.original: フリューから『ホロライブ』プライズが全国アミューズメント施設にて続々展開中！
subtitles.english: Hololive prizes from FuRyu are rolling out at amusement centers nationwide!

subtitles.original: パペットぬいぐるみ、寝そべりぬいぐるみ、指パペット、キャンディ缶。
subtitles.english: Puppet plushes, Nesoberi plushes, finger puppets, and candy tins.

subtitles.original: 4月からは新たに、ひっかけフィギュアも登場！
subtitles.english: Starting in April, new 'Hikkake' figures will also be available!

subtitles.original: フリュー！
subtitles.english: FuRyu!

subtitles.original: 台湾旅行中、最も便利な決済サービスを提供します。
subtitles.english: Providing the most convenient payment service for your trip to Taiwan.

subtitles.original: hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony 一カ通限定盲包
subtitles.english: hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony iPASS Limited Blind Packs

subtitles.original: 歌いたい曲が入っていなかった...
subtitles.english: The song I wanted to sing wasn't there...

subtitles.original: だったらJOYSOUND X1で歌おうぜ！
subtitles.english: Then let's sing with JOYSOUND X1!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1 俺の番！ JOYSOUND X1!
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1, it's my turn! JOYSOUND X1!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1 曲数ナンバー1！
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1, number one in song count!

subtitles.original: AIが採点 絶賛 カラオケ最高 歌えるって最高！
subtitles.english: AI scoring, highly acclaimed, karaoke is the best, singing is the best!

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND REVOLUTION 見ようぜ 曲数No.1 歌いたい曲があるって最高
subtitles.english: Check out JOYSOUND REVOLUTION! Number one in song count, it's great to have songs you want to sing

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場のお客様へ
subtitles.english: Attention: Information for Visitors

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上 照明の点滅にご注意ください / 声出し応援 OK です
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance / Cheering loudly is OK

subtitles.english: hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony PENLIGHT COLORS
